caseTitle: Shoaib Ullah Cheema v. Additional Registrar of Companies, S.E.C.P.
authorJudge: MR. JUSTICE MIAN SAQIB NISAR, HCJ
tagline: Section 10(1) of the Companies Ordinance, 1984 provides that a winding up order as well as any order passed or decision made by the Company Judge after the winding up of a company should be appealable before the Supreme Court instead of the Division Bench of the High Court.
